ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 785
ygData.msgSnippet: ... get under one of the stalls, type /trader and make sure you put a price for each of your items before you click begin trader
ygData.messageBody:
EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> There is 1 message in this issue.
>
> Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. Trading at the Bazaar.
> From: "Edward Fox" <edward001@...>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2003 01:24:57 -0000
> From: "Edward Fox" <edward001@...>
> Subject: Trading at the Bazaar.
>
> Ok. I have my traders satchel. I have goods in the satchel. I'm in
> the Bazaar. Now how do I start the trading? Do I have to become a
> trader? How do I do that if so? I'm still learning but I'm enjoying
> the game even so.
>
> Edward Fox
>
>
>

get under one of the stalls, type /trader and make sure you put a price
for each of your items before you click 'begin trader'
